formalText: She's kind of been wallowing this week.
She felt like she was going to do a push through ad something would happen and she just couldn't cope.
She didn't feel anxious or have trouble sleeping.
She just kind of felt depressed.
It didn't make her stuck. It pretty much just kind of made her not want to do anything.
She slept more, and his mom had brought her six chocolate bars for Christmas, and she ate chocolate, which is not the best.
She's also just been pressured this whole week that her friend is leaving and him being in the hospital.
It's just like she can't keep herself together.
She used to be much better at pulling herself together.
Last January she was having a horrible time.
